Package com.eventApp.DAO

Class ClubDAO

java.lang.Object
com.eventApp.DAO.ClubDAO
public class ClubDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for club-related database operations. Handles CRUD operations for clubs, event creation for clubs, and club validation.

      public ClubDAO()

  • Method Details

    • registrationClub

      public void registrationClub(Club club) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, DatabaseExceptionHandler
      Registers a new club in the system. Creates the club with pending status for admin approval.
      Parameters:
      club - the Club object containing club information
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database operation fails
      ClassNotFoundException - if database driver is not found
      DatabaseExceptionHandler - if club registration fails

    • getClubList

      public MyClubQueue getClubList(String clubStatus)
      Retrieves all clubs with a specific status from the database. Uses a custom queue data structure for storage.
      Parameters:
      clubStatus - the status to filter clubs by (e.g., "Approved", "Pending")
      Returns:
      MyClubQueue containing all clubs with the specified status

    • getClubNameBy

      public String getClubNameBy(int clubId)
      Retrieves the club name for a given club ID.
      Parameters:
      clubId - the unique identifier of the club
      Returns:
      String containing the club name, or null if not found

    • getClubIdBy

      public int getClubIdBy(String clubName) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves the club ID for a given club name.
      Parameters:
      clubName - the name of the club to search for
      Returns:
      int club ID, or -1 if club not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database operation fails
      ClassNotFoundException - if database driver is not found

    • getClubById

      public Club getClubById(int clubId)
      Retrieves complete club information for a given club ID.
      Parameters:
      clubId - the unique identifier of the club
      Returns:
      Club object with all club details, or null if not found

    • getClubIdByUserId

      public static int getClubIdByUserId(String userId) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException, DatabaseExceptionHandler
      Retrieves the club ID for a club that a specific user is a member of. Used to determine which club a user belongs to for authorization purposes.
      Parameters:
      userId - the unique identifier of the user
      Returns:
      int club ID of the club the user is a member of
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database operation fails
      ClassNotFoundException - if database driver is not found
      DatabaseExceptionHandler - if user is not a member of any club

    • checkClubNameExist

      public void checkClubNameExist(String clubName) throws ValidationException
      Validates that a club name doesn't already exist in the database. Throws an exception if the name is already taken.
      Parameters:
      clubName - the club name to validate for uniqueness
      Throws:
      ValidationException - if the club name already exists

    • getAllClubList

      public MyClubQueue getAllClubList()
      Retrieves all clubs from the database regardless of status. Results are ordered by creation date.
      Returns:
      MyClubQueue containing all clubs in the system

    • getAllClubNames

      public List<String> getAllClubNames() throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Retrieves a list of all approved club names, sorted alphabetically. Used for dropdown menus and selection components.
      Returns:
      List containing names of all approved clubs
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database operation fails
      ClassNotFoundException - if database driver is not found
